mapper.sql: id, total_num AS totalNum, sale_type AS saleType, join_shop AS joinShop, customer_name AS customerName, designer, user_shop_fee AS userShopFee, post_way AS postWay, total_price AS totalPrice, wx_pay_price AS wxPayPrice, alipay_pay_price AS alipayPayPrice, cash_pay_price AS cashPayPrice, card_pay_price AS cardPayPrice, status, remark, other, create_date AS createDate, create_user AS createUser, update_date AS updateDate, update_user AS updateUser, deleteFlag,inner_order_id as innerOrderId
mapper.select: select o.id, total_num AS totalNum, sale_type AS saleType, join_shop AS joinShop, customer_name AS customerName, designer, user_shop_fee AS userShopFee, post_way AS postWay, total_price AS totalPrice, wx_pay_price AS wxPayPrice, alipay_pay_price AS alipayPayPrice, cash_pay_price AS cashPayPrice, card_pay_price AS cardPayPrice, status, remark, other, create_date AS createDate, create_user AS createUser, update_date AS updateDate, update_user AS updateUser, deleteFlag,inner_order_id as innerOrderId from laca_product_order o where o.deleteFlag=0
